topic.title: Special Features of the Chapter Structure

section.title: Chapter
section.p: Chapters in manuscripts are enclosed with the element <div>. The @type attribute can contain additional values for manuscript-typical text types in addition to the values permitted in the DTABf:

section.title: Title
section.p: If the title of a chapter is written in the manuscript at the margin, the <head> element receives a @type attribute, which can receive the values "leftMargin" (entry at the left margin) or "rightMargin" (entry at the right margin).

body.codeblock: <head type="leftMargin">[title on the left margin of page]</head>
<head type="rightMargin">[title on the right margin of page]</head>
